word: Make room for us in your hearts.
parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From chora; to be in space, i.e. to pass, enter, or to hold, admit.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To act unjustly towards, injure, harm. From adikos; to be unjust, i.e. do wrong.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To corrupt, spoil, destroy, ruin. Probably strengthened from phthio; properly, to shrivel or wither, i.e. To spoil or to ruin.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To take advantage of, overreach, defraud. From pleonektes; to be covetous, i.e. to over-reach.
